definitions.body: gather, collect (a) persons Ge 29:22, Ge 42:17 (sq. [[אֶל־]]) Ex 3:16, Ex 4:29, Nu 11:16, Nu 11:24, Nu 21:16, Jos 2:18 (sq. [[אֶל־]] + [[־ה]] loc.) Jos 24:1 (sq. [[־ה]] loc.; all these JE); 1Sa 5:8, 1Sa 5:11, 2Ki 23:1 (sq. [[אֶל־]]) Jos 2:16, Is 11:12, Zep 3:8, Hb Hab 2:5, Ez Eze 11:17 (all ‖[[קבץ]]) +; collect men, people, armies, etc., for fighting Nu 21:23 (E) Ju Jdg 11:20, 1Sa 17:1, 2Sa 10:17, 2Sa 12:29 +; cf. Zec 14:2 (sq. [[עַל־]] against); (b) once obj. beasts Je 12:9; (c) things, esp. fruits of earth Ex 23:10, Ex 23:16 (Cov't code) Le 25:3, Le 25:20, Le 25:39 (H) De 11:14, De 16:13, De 28:38, Is 17:5, Je 40:10, Je 40:12, Job 39:12, Ps 39:7; cf. Ru 2:7 (‖[[לקט]] glean); the quails Nu 11:32, Nu 11:32; food in gen. ([[מַאֲכָל]]) Ge 6:21 (sq. [[אֶל־]]); eggs Is 10:14; money 2Ki 22:4, 2Ch 24:11; ashes of red heifer Nu 19:9, Nu 19:10; chariots 1Ki 10:26, 2Ch 1:14, etc.; of fisherman ([[בְּמִכְמַרְתּוֹ]], in metaph.) Hb Hab 1:15; of collecting wind Pr 30:4 [[מִי]] [[־רוּחַ בְּחָפְנׇיו]]´[[א]].

gather an individual into company of others: (a) obj. pers. esp. gather to one's father 2Ki 22:20 ([[עַל־אֲבׂתֶיךָ]]) = 2Ch 34:28 ([[אֶל־]]; both ‖ Niph. of same vb. q. v.); hence also (b) bring, obj. pers. 1Sa 14:52 (on form here v. Dr) 2Sa 11:27 (both sq. [[אֶל־]]), association, responsibility, protection being implied; also of stray ox or sheep De 22:2 (sq. [[אֶל־תּוֹח]]); hence also (c) take up, care for, subj. ´[[י]] Ps 27:10 (cf. perh. Is 40:11 [[קבץ]]); (d) draw up the feet upon the bed ([[אֶל־]]) Ge 49:33.
bring up the rear of Is 58:8 [[יַאַסְפֶָךָ]] ´[[כְּבוֹד י]] i.e. be thy rear-guard (‖[[הָלַח לְפָנֶיךָ חִדְקֶָךָ]])—Is 52:12 has Pi. [[מְאַסִּפְכֶם]] q. v. †

gather and take away, remove, withdraw 1Sa 14:19 (obj. hand), Je 10:17 (bundle, sq. [[מִן]]), leprosy 2Ki 5:11 (v. [[חרע]]); cf. also [[מִצָּרַעַת]] ´[[א]], remove (set free) a man from leprosy v:2Ki 5:3; v:2Ki 5:6; v:2Ki 5:7; Ge 30:23, Is 4:1 (reproach), Ps 85:4 (wrath, ‖[[הֵשִׁיב]]), Je 16:5 (peace, sq. [[מִן]]), Joe 2:10, Joe 3:15 (light), Ps 26:9 ([[נֶפֶשׁ]]) so Ju Jdg 18:25; Ps 104:29 ([[רוּחַ]]) v. also Job 34:14 (sq. [[אֶל־]]); hence destroy 1Sa 15:6 obj. pers.); pass. [[אֲסֻפֵי רָעָב]] destroyed with hunger Ez Eze 34:29; also Inf. abs. Je 8:13, Zep 1:2 (joined with [[הֵסִיף]] fr. [[סוף]], v. Kö:i. 445; considered Hiph. Inf. abs. by Ba:NB 73 v. supr.)

assemble, be gathered, reflex. (a) subj. men Ge 49:1 (‖[[קבץ]] v:Ge 49:2), Is 43:9 (‖[[קבץ]]), 2Ch 30:3 (sq. [[לְ]]) v:2Ch 30:13 (sq. acc. loc.), Ezr 3:1, Ezr 9:4, Ne 8:1, Ne 8:13 (all sq. [[אֶל־]]) Ne 9:1, Ne 12:28; earlier mostly of assembling for war Ge 34:30 (sq. [[עַל־]]), Jos 10:5, Ju Jdg 6:33, Jdg 9:6, Jdg 10:17 ‖[[נחעק]]), Jdg 20:11 (sq. [[אֶל־]]) v:Jdg 20:14 (sq. [[־ה]] loc.), 1Sa 13:11 (sq. acc. loc.) +; (b) subj. flocks, etc. Ge 29:3 (pass.; sq. [[שָׁמָּה]]) v:Ge 29:7, v:Ge 29:8 (all J); fish Nu 11:22 (cf. Hb 1:25 Qal); (c) inanim. subj. herbs Pr 27:25; water 2Sa 14:14 (in sim.); bones for burial Je 8:2 cf. Je 25:33 (bodies of slain) v. also Ez Eze 29:5 (‖[[קבץ]] which Co rds. [[קבר]]), appar. = compose, arrange for burial.

; (a) be gathered to one's fathers [[אֶל־אֲבוֹתָיו]]´[[נֶא]] Ju Jdg 2:10; elsewh. to one's people [[אֶל־עַמָּיו]] (all P) Ge 25:8, Ge 25:17, Ge 35:29 (‖[[וַיִּגְוַע וַיׇּמָת]]) Ge 49:29, Ge 49:33 (‖[[גוע]]), Nu 20:24, Nu 20:26 (‖[[מות]] Nu 27:13, Nu 27:13, Nu 31:2, De 32:50, De 32:50 (both ‖[[מות]]); also [[אֶל־קִבְרׂתֶיךָ]] 2Ki 22:20 = 2Ch 34:28 both ‖ Qal q.v.); hence also (b) be brought in (into association with others, etc.) Nu 12:14, Nu 12:15 (E) of Miriam, after leprosy; also refl. betake oneself, of Moses Nu 11:30 (E), cf. 2Sa 17:13 (both sq. [[אֶל־]]); even with inanim. subj. Je 47:6 [[הֵאָֽסְפִי]] [[אֶל־תַּעְרֵח]] (addressed to sword); of man & beast brought home (sq. [[־ה]] loc.) for protection Ex 9:19.
; be taken away, removed, perish, of men Is 57:1, Is 57:1 (‖[[אבד]]); fish Ho 4:3; gladness Is 16:10, Je 48:33 (sq. [[מִן]]); also reflex., withdraw itself, of moon Is 60:20 (‖[[בוא שׁמשׁ]]). †
gather harvest Is 62:9 (‖[[קבץ]]); bodies for burial Je 9:21.
take in, receive into (sq. [[בַּיְתָה]]) Ju Jdg 19:15, Jdg 19:18.
as subst. rearguard, rearward Nu 10:25 (P) Jos 6:9, Jos 6:13 (both E); fig. of God Is 52:12. †

definitions.body: Pf. [[וְאֻסַּף]] (cons.) Is 33:4, Zec 14:14 etc.; Pt. [[מְאֻסָּף]] Ez Eze 38:12—be gathered, of men Is 24:22, Ho 10:10 (sq. [[עַל]] against), Ez Eze 38:12; booty Is 33:4; wealth Zec 14:14. †
